Name: Never pause at exceptions
Description: Can I prevent the debugger from pausing at exceptions?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. In **Sources**, right click on the line number that throws an exception and select "Never pause here".

Firefox.Notes: 1. InÂ **Debugger**, right click on the line number that throws an exception and select "Never pause here".

Edge.Notes: 1. In **Sources**, right click on the line number that throws an exception and select "Never pause here".

Safari.Notes: 1. In **Sources**, right click on the line that throws exceptions, select "Edit Breakpoint..." > Enter the condition as `false`.

Opera.Notes: 1. In **Sources**, right click on the line number that throws an exception and select "Never pause here".
